title: 262: Building a Community Around Your Mission with Sarah Pendrick
itunes:title: 262: Building a Community Around Your Mission with Sarah Pendrick
description:
People are craving community and it is YOUR opportunity to create the community you wish you had. In this episode, we discus how to overcome your imposter syndrome and fear of judgement so you can create a community around your mission, whether it’s hosting events big or small, retreats, workshops, podcasts, books or anything else. Your message deserves to be heard and you get to make it fun!

Sahara no longer facilitates this mastermind but instead created the Dharma Coaching Institute to train people to become Certified Dharma Coaches. Find out more at iamsahararose.com

Get 20% off your Organifi Green Juice + Adaptogenic Superfood blends at organifi.com with coupon code "sahara"

Download Best Fiends on the Apple Store and let me know what level you're on

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

Discover your Dosha and receive custom results for your mind and body with my free quiz at eatfeelfresh.com/new-quiz

Connect with me for daily Ayurvedic and modern spiritual wisdom at: Instagram.com/iamsahararose
Facebook.com/iamsahararose Twitter.com/iamsahararose

Order My Books Eat Feel Fresh + Idiot's Guide to Ayurveda: https://www.iamsahararose.com/books
